name: Space Inversion 2
description:
Probably the Best Arcade Invaders game on Apple TV!
The ultimate Arcade Invaders from the #1 smash-hit IOS game has landed on Apple TV.
Play classic or the new Arcade mode with Mega weapons to even up the odds and cool bonus rounds.
Choose from many visual styles including Arcade Cellophane, Green screen monitor, 70's Red LCD, 80's flickery Interlace.

(Just a small recent selection of the 100's of IOS reviews)

" Great retro space invaders shoot 'em up! Love it! Brings back all the memories and nostalgia. Plays fantastically well. 10/10 "
" Great old school shooter. Takes me back to my 2600 "
" Great space invaders shoot em up, takes you back to your childhood"
" Just like the original Atari version only BETTER!!! If you loved this when you were a kid, you will really enjoy the upgrade!! "
" Best arcade game ever!!! "
" Very old game, but still awesome to play to bring back the great memories of space invaders. "
" A really good addictive game to play, just like the arcades were. Thoroughly enjoyable and not quite as easy as it looks. Great Game! "


Stunning visuals re-created especially for TV this game will have you happily blasting away for hours.
Features many visual styles to re-create the retro arcade experience including 70's Red LCD, Colour Cellophane, Green screen monitor and many more.


Space Inversion 2 is exclusive to Apple Mobile, Tablet and TV.
Accept no substitute!


Features:
* Compatible with Remote and Game Controllers.
* Lots of cool visuals styles from retro to modern and even Doodle and Neon styles!
* Fast, slick addictive game play
* Arcade and Classic play
* Power ups give you extra fire power, shields and a slow motion "Warp" mode
* Super High Definition graphics
* Game Center Leaderboards & Achievements to compete for the best scores in the universe!
* Out of this world music and sound effects.

Languages:
English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Korean.


Please help us to make Space Inversion 2 even better by rating it at the App Store.
If you have any issues with the game let us know and we will endeavour to address them in updates.
